DOC.brief_summary: This 4-arm study evaluate compare bleed pattern three different dos DR-1031 oral contraceptive Seasonale oral contraceptive . Study participant receive physical gynecological exam , include Pap smear . During study , participant require complete diary
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Bleeding Patterns With Three Different Doses DR-1031 Compared Seasonale
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , prospective , multicenter , double-blinded , randomize study design evaluate compare bleed pattern woman use one three different dos DR-1031 oral contraceptive Seasonale oral contraceptive . Patients meet study entrance criterion randomly assign one four treatment group , The overall study duration approximately 9 month ; include screen period approximately 4 week , run-in period 4 week , treatment period approximately 6 month ( two,91-day cycle ) final study visit occur 14-21 day completion study drug .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Not pregnant breastfeed Agree use backup nonhormonal contraception study period Any contraindication use oral contraceptive Pregnancy within last 3 month Smoking > 10 cigarette per day
